price: Yεtͻͻ nsuo bi paa guu wͻn so. Na εyε nsutͻ bͻne paa de ma amanfoͻ a yɛabͻ wͻn kͻkͻ no.
arabic: وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم مَّطَرٗاۖ فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلۡمُنذَرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-amṭarnā ʿalayhim maṭaran fasāa maṭaru al-mundharīna
